column4: Hey. I just installed Ubuntu 12.10 with the Windows Installer. Everything went well, and now on Start Up when it prompts me to choose an operating system, after I select Ubuntu the screen goes black. I waited for a couple of minutes but nothing ever changes
Apparently WUBI doesn't work with 32-bit anymore for some insane reason and they never even warned anyone :/
I have the same thing and dunno if I can help. I suggest doing a proper install
